import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './Sidebar.css' import {assets} from '../../assets/assets' const Sidebar = () => { const [extended,setExtended] = useState (false) const {onSent,prevPrompts,setRecentPrompt} = useContext return (
setExtended(prev=>!prev)} className='menu' src={assets.menu_icon} alt="" />
{extended ?

New Chat

: null }
{extended ?

Recent

What is react...

: null }
{extended ?

Help

:null}
{extended ?

Activity

:null}
{extended ?

Settings

:null}
) } export default Sidebar
